TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TransactionInterop extends System.Object
public ref class TransactionInterop abstract sealed

summary.span: 促进 和以前编写的用于与 MSDTC、COM+ 或 进行交互的组件之间的交互。

span.span: Facilitates interaction between and components that were previously written to interact with MSDTC, COM+, or .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供事务传播方法。This class provides methods for transaction propagation. 有关此过程的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[事务传播](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp)。For more information on how this process works, see [Transaction Propagation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/b09541e6-4baf-4e37-b879-62884fbb0969.asp). 使用此类提供的方法，可以参与两种类型的事务传播：导出/导入（推送模型）和发送器/接收方（请求模型）。Using the methods provided by this class, you can engage in two types of transaction propagations, Export/Import (push model) and Transmitter/Receiver (pull model). 导出/导入（推送模型）传播涉及到这些步骤，The Export/Import (push model) propagation involves these steps, 1. 在远程计算机上，通过调用方法获取该计算机的事务管理器的 "行踪" 。On the remote machine, obtain the "whereabouts" of the transaction manager of that machine by calling the method. 然后，你可以在客户端计算机上缓存此信息以供将来使用。You can then cache this piece of information on the client machine for future usage. 2. 使用任何首选方法将包含行踪的数据发送到客户端计算机Send the data containing the whereabouts to the client machine using any preferred method 3. 在客户端计算机上，使用行踪将事务 "导出" 到远程计算机，并生成事务 "cookie"。On the client machine, use the whereabouts to "export" the transaction to the remote machine and generate a transaction "cookie". 这是通过调用 并传入远程计算机的行踪来完成的。This is done by calling and passing in the remote machine's whereabouts. 4. 使用任何首选方法将包含事务 "cookie" 的数据发送到远程计算机Send the data containing the transaction "cookie" to the remote machine using any preferred method 5. 在远程计算机上，使用事务 "cookie" 通过调用方法来获取客户端事务的克隆 。On the remote machine, use the transaction "cookie" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling the method. 6. 在远程计算机上，使用 "克隆" 事务通过类的或方法登记资源管理器 。On the remote machine, use the clone transaction to enlist the resource manager using the or methods of the class. 发送器/接收方（请求模型）传播涉及到这些步骤，The Transmitter/Receiver (pull model) propagation involves these steps, - 在客户端计算机上，使用事务通过调用On the client machine, using the transaction generates a corresponding "propagation token" by calling - 使用任何首选方法将包含事务 "传播令牌" 的数据发送到远程计算机Send the data containing the "propagation token" of the transaction to the remote machine using any preferred method - 在远程计算机上，使用 "传播令牌" 通过调用获取客户端事务的克隆On the remote machine, use the "propagation token" to obtain a clone of the client transaction by calling 当事务令牌发送到远程计算机时，发送器/接收方模型提供更好的性能，但远程计算机不能使用它来获取事务。The Transmitter/Receiver model provides better performance in scenarios where the transaction token is sent to a remote machine, but the remote machine may not use it to obtain the transaction. 这是因为在调用之前不会传播事务 。This is because the transaction is not propagated until is called. 另一个优点是，传播令牌可以发送到任何远程计算机，而导出 cookie 只能在提供行踪的计算机上使用。Another advantage is that the propagation token can be sent to any remote machine, while the export cookie can be used only on the machine that provided the whereabouts. 但你还应注意，远程事务管理器的行踪封装在所有传播令牌中，使其大于导出/导入模型中相应的事务 cookie。However, you should also note that the whereabouts of remote transaction managers are encapsulated in all the propagation tokens, making them bigger than the corresponding transaction cookies from the Export/Import model. **注意**此类型使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用; 但是，只需要直接调用方拥有 `FullTrust` 权限集。**Note** This type uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 将事务对象转换为导出事务 Cookie。

span.span: Transforms a transaction object into an export transaction cookie.

returns.span: 表示指定的 对象的导出事务 Cookie。

span.span: An export transaction cookie representing the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要导出事务，请调用此方法。Call this method if you want to export a transaction. `transaction`沿传递的被封送到事务 cookie 中。The `transaction` that is passed along is marshaled into a transaction cookie. 然后，您可以将事务 cookie 发送到目标进程。You can then send the transaction cookie to the destination process. 这称为在进程或系统之间传播事务。This is referred to as propagating the transaction between processes or systems. 传播被视为推送模式，其中本地事务被推送到目标。The propagation is considered to be a push model where the local transaction is pushed to the destination. 因此，中包含的信息 `whereabouts` 必须描述目标事务管理器。Therefore, information contained in `whereabouts` must describe the destination transaction manager. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

summary.span: 从指定的传输器传播标记生成 实例。

returns.span: 指定的传输程序传播标记中的 。

span.span: A from the specified transmitter propagation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与 方法一起提供 "请求" 传播功能，在此方法调用此方法来取消封送事务时，事务将从远程计算机 "拉取"。This method, together with the method, provide functionality for "pull" propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when this method is called to unmarshal the transaction. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

exception.span: 事务的反序列化因无法联系事务管理器而失败。

span.span: The deserialization of a transaction fails because the transaction manager cannot be contacted.

exception.span: 这可能是由网络防火墙或安全设置导致的。

span.span: This may be caused by network firewall or security settings.

span.span: This method, together with the method, provide functionality for Transmitter/Receiver propagation, in which the transaction is "pulled" from the remote machine when the latter is called to unmarshal the transaction.

returns.span: 有关不同传播模型的详细信息，请参阅 类。

span.span: For more information on different propagation models, see class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] GetWhereabouts ();
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] GetWhereabouts() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetWhereabouts () As Byte()
public: static cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetWhereabouts();
static member GetWhereabouts : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 获取 使用的分布式事务管理器的“行踪”。

span.span: Gets the Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

returns.span: 使用的分布式事务管理器的“行踪”。

span.span: The Whereabouts of the distributed transaction manager that uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行踪包含一个说明事务管理器位置的地址。The Whereabouts contains an address that describes the location of a transaction manager. 这允许两个事务管理器相互通信，从而将事务从一个系统传播到另一个系统。This permits two transaction managers to communicate with one another and thereby propagate a transaction from one system to the other. 此方法返回的信息可用于提供与方法的推送模型事务传播的位置信息 。The information returned by this method can be used to provide location information for push model transaction propagation with the method. 有关不同传播模型的更多信息，请参阅 类的“备注”部分。For more information on different propagation models, see the Remarks section of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly Guid PromoterTypeDtc;
.field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid PromoterTypeDtc
Public Shared ReadOnly PromoterTypeDtc As Guid
public: static initonly Guid PromoterTypeDtc;
staticval mutable PromoterTypeDtc : Guid

summary.span: 分布式事务处理器的类型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Transaction.PromoterType`如果事务已或将升级到 MSDTC，则此值用于属性，并且 `Transaction.GetPromotedToken` 方法将返回结果的 MSDTC 事务传播标记 `byte[]` 。This value is used for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property if the transaction is or will be promoted to MSDTC and the `Transaction.GetPromotedToken` method will return an MSDTC transaction propagation token for the `byte[]` result.
